name: part_011
file: tmp_【 #沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE 】沙花叉クロヱと不思議なキノコ 【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [rvIy1IOZNtA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe finishes a energetic song performance with dancing and background effects.
Chloe catches her breath, drinks water, and talks to the audience about her birthday LIVE and introduces her new song.
Chloe performs her new song 'Mo-Doku' with lyrics displayed on screen.
Chloe thanks the audience after the performance.

subtitles.original: 右左君君右下上目きゅるんめちぇかわ！
subtitles.english: Right, left, you, you, bottom right, upward glance, kyurun, so cute!

subtitles.original: 右左君君右下上目きゅるんめちぇかわ！
subtitles.english: Right, left, you, you, bottom right, upward glance, kyurun, so cute!

subtitles.original: はぁ、はぁ、もう無理疲れた。
subtitles.english: Ah, ah, I'm at my limit, I'm so tired.

subtitles.original: あ、あざす。あざす。
subtitles.english: Ah, thanks. Thanks.

subtitles.original: ということで、えー...
subtitles.english: So, um...

subtitles.original: 『アイドル・ペット』右左君君右下上目
subtitles.english: That was 'Idol Pet: Left Right You You Bottom Right

subtitles.original: きゅるんめちぇかわでしたー！
subtitles.english: Upper Glance Kyurun Mecha-Kawa'!

subtitles.original: 自分の曲なのに、毎回言えないんですけど...
subtitles.english: Even though it's my own song, I can't say it right every time...

subtitles.original: はい、いやでも本当にね、あの、頑張ってやりきったんじゃないかなと思って。
subtitles.english: Yes, well, but really, I think I did my best to get through it.

subtitles.original: ちょっと本当に緊張してたんですけど、『ペット』ぐらいからちょっと緊張飛んできたかなって感じで。
subtitles.english: I was really nervous, but from around 'Pet', I feel like the tension started to fade.

subtitles.original: あとは楽しむだけな！
subtitles.english: Now all that's left is to enjoy it!

subtitles.original: 最後の曲になっちゃうんですよ、でも。あっという間だった！
subtitles.english: But it's already time for the last song. It went by in a flash!

subtitles.original: なんて？ごめん、カミカミでごめんって。
subtitles.english: What? Sorry, sorry for stumbling over my words.

subtitles.original: 最後の曲はですね、なんと...
subtitles.english: The last song is, actually...

subtitles.original: すりぃさんに作曲いただいた新曲になります！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: a new song composed by Surii-san! Yay!

subtitles.original: この曲はですね、世の中に対する毒がたくさん込められた、
subtitles.english: This song contains a lot of poison towards the world,

subtitles.original: ちょっとダークな楽曲になっています。
subtitles.english: it's a bit of a dark piece.

subtitles.original: で、こちらの曲なんですけど、リリースとMVの公開はまだ少し先になってしまうので、
subtitles.english: And as for this song, the release and MV premiere are still a little while away,

subtitles.original: 本日は特別に先行お披露目という形で歌って躍らせていただきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: so today I'd like to perform it as a special advance reveal!

subtitles.original: もう一回飲んでもいいですか？ごめんなさい。
subtitles.english: Can I have one more drink? Sorry.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。すいません。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Sorry.

subtitles.original: はい。ということで、では...
subtitles.english: Alright. So, then...

subtitles.original: 最後まで引き続き楽しんでってください。いきますよ、はぁー！
subtitles.english: please continue to enjoy until the very end. Here we go, haa!

subtitles.original: モードク / 作詞・作曲・編曲：すりぃ
subtitles.english: Mo-Doku / Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Surii

subtitles.original: 相談ね はいはい 正論じゃ嫌な連中
subtitles.english: Consultation? Yeah, right. People who hate logical arguments.

subtitles.original: 同情はないない 悪いのアナタ
subtitles.english: No sympathy at all. It's your fault.

subtitles.original: 語彙が足んない 伝わらないわ
subtitles.english: Lack of vocabulary. It won't get across.

subtitles.original: 感情はないない つまんないのよ
subtitles.english: No emotions at all. It's so boring.

subtitles.original: ドドドコドコドク ドドドコドコドク
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-ko-do-ko-doku...

subtitles.original: さよならはー もう会わない 興味がないわ
subtitles.english: Goodbye. We won't meet again. I'm not interested.

subtitles.original: ドドドコドコドク
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-ko-do-ko-doku...

subtitles.original: はい正解 アタシの勝ち 奪っておいて無駄
subtitles.english: Yes, correct. I win. It's useless even if you take it.

subtitles.original: 結論非効率ダメ
subtitles.english: Conclusion: Inefficient, no good.

subtitles.english: Mo-Doku-Doku, let me spit it out.

subtitles.english: It's a pain, dealing with you.

subtitles.original: 嫌い 嫌い 嫌い 嫌い
subtitles.english: Hate, hate, hate, hate.

subtitles.english: Am I not allowed to laugh? How fragile.

subtitles.english: Mo-Doku-Doku, perfectly calm.

subtitles.original: 表情も変えないで論破
subtitles.english: Winning the argument without changing expression.

subtitles.english: Hate, hate, hate, hate.
